actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to allow the distribution in interstate commerce of goods produced by prison inmates who are paid not less than the prevailing minimum wages as determined for purposes of the Walsh-Healy Act.

summary.text: Permits the distribution in interstate commerce of goods produced by convicts or prisoners within the United States if such inmates were paid not less than the prevailing minimum wages for persons employed in similar work in the same locality.

titles.title: A bill to allow the distribution in interstate commerce of goods produced by prison inmates who are paid not less than the prevailing minimum wages as determined for purposes of the Walsh-Healy Act.
